text: Hi everyone! The company I work at is rebranding, and we'll need a new website (with copy and designs provided by us). Aside from this project, scheduled for April, we'd love to build a long-term relationship with a HubSpot expert or experts, with future endeavours and occasional maintenance in mind :slightly_smiling_face:
hi <@U038V0M6GE9> happy to have this chat with you. We are based in Manchester UK. let me drop you a pm
Hi <@U02CS2Q38QG>! If qualified and a good fit, we would certainly consider the individual.
Hi <@U038V0M6GE9> happy to help too. Will send you som info :slightly_smiling_face:
